numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph breaks down the ages of people.
2. The graph surveys whether people think that future generations will make the world a better place.
3. People who are 25-39 years old were not surveyed.
4. I wonder why the results for Indonesia are very high.
5. I wonder why the results for Brazil are very low.
6. I wonder why the results for Mali are very low.
7. I wonder whether the location of a country impacted the results of the country.
8. I wonder whether these results will change in the future.
9. I wonder how these results compare to results in the past.
11. I am in the 15-24 year old category.
12. I think that the world gets better with each generation.
14. If a community is optimistic then the community will do everything in its power to make changes.
15. My community will do everything in its power to make changes.
16. My community wants the world to be a better place.
17. The graph displays how people of different ages think about whether the world gets better with each generation.
18. The headline is: Will the world get better with time?
19. The headline is: Or will the younger generations be our downfall?
